author: TheDannyMan

text:
Thunder Spirits had a great OST.

I personally prefer the Thunder Force III OST, but I'm an FM nerd. Toshinori Hiramatsu did some amazing music and is definitely in my top VG musicians list along with people like Yuzo Koshiro and Hiroshi Kawaguchi! <3

author: eddy finnemore

text:
If I'm not mistaken, the port for the SNES actually originated from Thunder Force AC, the arcade version of Thunder Force III for the Sega Genesis.
In fact, Thunder Force AC ended up itself is a modified port of Thunder Force III.

text:
WOW Thanks for putting this up!
You would be surprised, but I actually raise up in the morning with this song! I've got this set up in the CD that plays when my alarm clock strat (along with The Grubby Dark Blue from this game, which is a little bit better I think).

Anyway, this game have a killer soundtrack! Gotta replay it someday...

author: SupraDarky

text: A great scrolling shooter for the SNES, basically a modified port of Thunder Force III for the Genesis. I rented this game when I was a kid and finished it in one sitting and I had forgotten about it until someone suggested a theme from this game on my channel.
